verbs.description: [ARG0: assaults] [V: leave] [ARG1: muni drivers] [ARG2: fearful for safety] [ARGM-TMP: as agency beefs up security] the 5-fulton bus had just pulled into the temporary transbay terminal on dec 11 for a three - minute stop it was n’t operator michelle moore usual drive she had picked up some extra hours by driving the line that day a man walked through the front doors of her coach reached around her safety screen and threw a cup of vomit at her into my mouth all over my eyes it went everywhere moore recalled shoulders shaking at a gathering of muni drivers on sept 7 it was just one of five assaults moore has experienced since starting the job in 2001 each year hundreds of verbal and physical assaults on muni roughly 2 000 operators are reported according to the san francisco municipal transportation agency
